body:
Not sure if this is the best place to put this, but it would be a neat idea to have tournaments for Nexus, CTH, and Walls!

Suggestions of each game:

  • Nexus games would be 10v10
  • Walls would be 5+5v5+5 (5 players in each quad, 2 quads make up 1 team). Players from different quads but the same team cannot hit each other 
  • CTH is 10v10
Restrictions on kits:

  • Nexus: Limited to Warrior, archer, medic and snake
  • Walls: each person must have a different kit
  • CTH: Limited to Warrior, Archer, and Mage 
Anyways, that's just my 2 cents. Please consider :D

title: More tourneys
